Package com.gmail.aydinov.sergey.simple_debugger_plugin.event

package com.gmail.aydinov.sergey.simple_debugger_plugin.event
Event model of the Simple Debugger Plugin.

This package contains event classes used for communication between different components of the debugger, including core logic, UI layer, and command handlers. Events represent significant state changes and actions such as debugger lifecycle transitions, execution flow updates, and user-triggered operations.

Events are produced by one part of the system and consumed by others, enabling loose coupling between components and clear separation of concerns across architectural layers.

Author: Sergei Aidinov
Email: sergey.aydinov@gmail.com
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/sergei-aydinov/

Since:
1.0
